name: Antirocketh
description: Antirocketh is a fast, arcade-style game about a laser-cannon morphing swarms of missiles into improbable stuff!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
